Deemos was hit by all of those bullets as well and acted like the world was=
 coming to an end before saying:

Deemos: That's it, we're getting out of h=
ere.

He barely avoided Rainchark's missile with a dive and roll and was ps=
yched out mentally. Stranato somersaulted through the air and landed on his=
 feet to avoid the missile.

Stranato: You NEVER attack the same way twice =
in a row.

Train Wreck changed to train mode and drove up.

Airbomber: Don'=
t got all day, Deemos, if you team needs a ride, you'd better get aboard no=
w or get left behind!

(Seeing as how Alloran can't move his characters bec=
ause he's on vacation, and since he's my best friend, I know I have permiss=
ion to do the following.)

Sharpedge gets aboard. Doom Ice and Rizopas help=
 Banzai-Tron aboard. Airbomber, Stranato, Stronghold, and Blender get aboar=
d after Doom ice and Rizopas. Holocaust looks horrified. Stranato lures Hol=
ocaust aboard with one of Sarge's hands he picked up.

Train Wreck: I'm goi=
ng to get shot while we're waiting.

Deemos gets aboard...

  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: rAuq (rauq@...) 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 12:53 AM
  Subject: Clash


  Hah! I man=
aged to get a hold of a comp with a dial up connection. 
  *shudders*

  An=
yway, SC:BW is definately one of the best RTS games our right now, 
  but I=
'd have to say that it ties Emperor - Battle for Dune. That game 
  ROCKS! =
=3D) The best integration of 3d animation into a RTS game 
  around. I  LIV=
E to see the worm explode from the sand to eat some of 
  the enemy units..=
. or mine but still worth it!

  LOL -- Lurker, it is quite difficult for m=
e to play on battle.net, 
  not because I have problems with the game, but =
because you won't find 
  any games that I own that I've bought. =3DP ANYTH=
ING can be downloaded. 
  =3D) I suggest you download Kahn.

  Also, Lurker=
, I suggest that you hold your position for now with the 
  carriers and th=
e new characters. I would also ask you to supply 
  detailed descriptions o=
f base defenses, the abilities of the ships, 
  and descriptions of the cha=
racters that you are bringing in. If the 
  council is going to discuss any=
thing, we need to be present. =3DP And, 
  most, if not all, of the council=
 is away.

  WHO IS KYLE STEWART?!? =3D) 

  --- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---

=
  Lokk continues his barrage of bullets at Deemos firing the rest of 
  his=
 clip. (20 bullets) He ducks behind the side of the mountain, and 
  starts=
 to reload. <Gotta  make them believe that the are surrounded 
  and they a=
re losing... commmon!> He fumbles with his clip and drops 
  it in his nerv=
ous haste. He picks up his clip and keeps reloading.

  Axis's charging las=
er keeps charging, almost at full power for anothe 
  round of fire. He lau=
nches another missile at Stranato headed at the 
  last location he targete=
d. (meaning, he arc'd the missile over the 
  pod and it is heading towards=
 where the last missile he fired landed, 
  which will most likely miss, ju=
st clarifying =3DP)

  Lynxiz sprints around, just out of visible range, an=
d sets Trinity 
  down. She starts to tend to Trinity's wounds.


  --- In =
nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
  > OOC: Only the best f*cking RT=
S in the world! Starcraft!


   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to=
 http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
